We are collaborating with @brevis_zk to build the next level of privacy stack on BNB Chain.

Our aim is to move beyond traditional privacy tools and create a smart and flexible system for everyone. This shift is significant as it introduces valuable use cases.

For users, identities can remain protected as credentials are verified using ZK proofs without revealing your entire wallet history.

For the industry, it directly addresses the longstanding challenge of distinguishing legitimate privacy from illicit activity. The upcoming Intelligent Privacy Pool developed with @0xbowio, will utilize "Association Sets" and ZK attestation to confirm that user funds are clean before transacting privately, a crucial step for institutional onchain adoption.

The benefits extend beyond private money transfers, enabling:
ğŸ”¸ Fair prediction markets: Algorithms can be verified as fair without disclosing proprietary logic.
ğŸ”¸ SocialFi verification: Real users can be verified without exposing their net worth.
ğŸ”¸ Verifiable AI: Models can be safely trained using private data.

We believe privacy is no longer just a simple toggle switch but a programmable layer. With these developments, BNB Chain is set to become the hub for compliant and intelligent privacy infrastructure.

#BNB Chain#  completed its 34th quarterly burn, permanently removing 1.37 million $BNB  worth approximately $1 .29 billion from circulation.   The burn was executed on January 15, with tokens sent to an irrecoverable address, reducing circulating supply to ~136.36 million BNB.   BNBâ€™s long-term supply cap remains 100 million tokens, with no new issuance.   BNB uses a dual burn system: a quarterly Auto-Burn based on price and on-chain activity, and a real-time gas fee burn from transactions.   Market reaction was muted immediately after the burn, with prices stabilizing shortly after execution. #Altcoin Season#  #BNBChain#
